translation.en: ♪ You get me closer to God ♪

for restraint. Okay?

Dear Lord, please take away

translation.en: in the face of the--
the devil.
John 3:16: "God so loved the world
translation.fr: Jean 3:16 : "Car Dieu a tant aimé le monde

I shall not be in want."
"I shall not be in want."
Oh, man. I really love you. [chuckles]

"And above all, love each other... deeply

-[groans ecstatically] -...a multitude... of... sin..."

What was your favorite part?

You experienced my world premiere.

but it's still, like, a lot cooler

maybe this is the year I-- I-- I do it.

-Half. -Yes, we want half.

translation.fr: Range ça tout de suite. Tenez.

translation.en: Count it, Sterling. [clears throat]
-That's great. Thank you. It's good. -All right. Good doing business with you.
translation.fr: - Merci. - Ravi de travailler avec vous.

translation.en: -As the old saying goes, "Bye." -Uh...
Hey, Bowser.
You look... manly.
Oily... Uh...
Vehicular-ly inclined.
Anyway, do you know how much it might cost us
translation.fr: À ton avis, combien ça nous coûterait

translation.en: to get that fixed? Roughly?
Oily, huh? Yeah.
Well, as a man who's crashed many cars,
translation.fr: Croyez-moi, j'ai bousillé pas mal de bagnoles.

translation.en: I'd say you'd probably run yourself about 5K worth of damage here.
translation.fr: Vous en avez pour au moins 5 000 balles de réparation.

translation.en: Um... Do you have any more jobs?
translation.fr: Tu as du boulot pour nous ?

translation.en: Ah, jeez, if I had any more jobs,
if I had more jobs-- Look...
I like you girls. I do.
You're fast as hell.
You run like a deer. It was amazing.
And you, you're a freakishly good shot.
translation.fr: Et toi, tu as l'œil pour viser.

translation.en: But I've got rent to pay. I can't split my rewards on folks I can nab on my own, see?
translation.fr: Mais je ne peux pas me permettre de partager mes primes.

translation.en: Hey, we get it.
Yeah, well, getting it is half the battle, ah?
translation.fr: Bien. Je savais que vous comprendriez.

translation.en: So, what do you want to do now?
Go to the Men's Parlor?
That secret club of which we know the exact location?
translation.fr: Ce club secret dont nous connaissons l'adresse exacte ?

translation.en: Hey, uh, what's the address over there?
translation.fr: Vous pourriez me dire où c'est ?

translation.en: The address alone won't get you very far.
translation.fr: Ça ne te servirait à rien.

translation.en: -And why is that? -You need us to get in it.
translation.fr: - Pourquoi ? - Tu ne pourras pas y rentrer.

translation.en: It-- um-- It's in this country club
translation.fr: - Pourquoi ? - Tu ne pourras pas y rentrer. C'est un club sportif privé qui n'accepte que des personnes…

translation.en: and they only cater to this specific clientele, it's--
translation.fr: C'est un club sportif privé qui n'accepte que des personnes…

translation.en: -White people. -Blair.
What? It's true!
I don't think it's written in stone, but...
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas gravé dans le marbre.

translation.en: actually, it--it might be.
So, unfortunately these places have some outdated policies that don't--
translation.fr: Ils ont un règlement complètement dépassé qu'on ne cautionne pas.

translation.en: Okay. Enough with the Black history, Reverend Al Sharpton. I get it. They're racist.
translation.fr: Ça suffit, Al Sharpton, j'ai compris. Ils sont racistes.

translation.en: -Right. -Yes.
Yeah, so you can have the address for,
translation.fr: Si tu veux, on peut te filer l'adresse pour

translation.en: I don't know, say... a hundred,
or you could have personal whitey escorts
translation.fr: Ou alors, tu nous engages pour qu'on t'accompagne

translation.en: -for three thou-- -Five.
Five thousand dollars.
If you deliver me John Stevens,
translation.fr: Si vous me ramenez John Stevens,

translation.en: y'all will get paid.
John Stevens, dude.
It can't be April's dad. There's gotta be a bajillion John Stevenses.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas forcément le père d'April.

translation.en: Bajillion John Stevenses that belong to Men's Parlor?
April's dad is the creep on our eighth grade trip to Jekyll Island
translation.fr: Ce mec m'a quand même dit en quatrième

translation.en: that said I was developing nicely.
Oh, barf. Yes.
I'd love to arrest him and watch April squirm.
Are you wearing my Savage X Fenty bralette again?
I hate you. You'll stink it up with your smelly boobs.
translation.fr: Il va encore sentir tes nichons !

translation.en: Now's not the time.
Cool. We know John Stevens.
Say again.
Oh, yeah, we brought him in before.
translation.fr: On l'avait déjà coffré une fois.

translation.en: What did the old boy do this time?
Solicitation and battery.
Real pillar of his community. Skipped bail last week, even.
translation.fr: Monsieur ne s'est pas présenté à sa convocation.

translation.en: Having a meeting tonight at The Men's Parlor at 6:00.
translation.fr: Il sera au Salon masculin à 18 h.

translation.en: My bail bondsman. My bail bondswoman...
translation.fr: Mon prêteur de caution… Enfin, ma prêteuse.

translation.en: My bail bondsperson got a tip.
translation.fr: Mon agence de prêt de caution a eu l'info.

translation.en: Dope.
Let's ride.
-Dope. Let's ride. -Hey! My car.
translation.fr: - Cool, c'est ti-par. - On prend ma caisse.

translation.en: Well, this is some Django shit.
Hey, Trevor. Hey, Miles.
Hey, Miss Wesley.
Miss Wesley.
Hey, Miles.
Oh, uh, you guys going to be parking today?
No. He's just dropping us off.
Park down by the service entrance,
download Fruit Ninja.
We'll be back with your guy.
What the hell is a "fruit ninja"?
I'm really hoping you have a plan.
translation.fr: J'espère que tu as un plan.

translation.en: Not so much a plan as like a general idea...ish...ment.
translation.fr: Disons que j'ai une petite idée. Vaguement.

translation.en: Care to enlighten me?
Okay, how about...
we walk into The Men's Parlor like a couple of Lara Crofts.
translation.fr: se glisser dans le Salon en mode Lara Croft.

translation.en: And then we slip some of my melatonin into Mr. Stevens' drink,
translation.fr: Ensuite, on met de la mélatonine dans le verre de Stevens, à la James Bond.

translation.en: like James Bond and then we grab him--
translation.fr: Ensuite, on met de la mélatonine dans le verre de Stevens, à la James Bond. Et ensuite…

translation.en: Or we can clock him in the head with this pistol?
translation.fr: Ou on l'assomme avec un flingue.

translation.en: You brought a pistol?
[woman] Hello, girls...
Hi, Mr. and Mrs. Jenson. Y'all are looking sharp.
translation.fr: M. et Mme Jenson ! Vous avez l'air en forme.

translation.en: Thank you.
I love that nail color, Mrs. Jenson.
It's like skin color, but prettier.
translation.fr: C'est couleur chair, mais en mieux.

translation.en: Y'all are too dang sweet.
Tell your mother and daddy we said hello.
Yes, ma'am, and see you Sunday morning bright and early.
Oh, you will.
Aren't they precious? I wish Frank would date one of them.
translation.fr: Je les adore. Elles seraient parfaites pour notre Frank.

translation.en: I wasn't going to meet up with a bounty hunter unarmed. That's just common sense.
translation.fr: On avait rendez-vous avec un chasseur de primes !

translation.en: Stranger danger.
[scoffs] He's not here. It's past six o'clock--
Hey. What are you two doing in here?
Come on, get over here.
-[Blair scoffs] -[Miles] Quick.
Are you two crazy?
That's The "Men's" Parlour.
Neither of you are mens.
Y-- Yeah, obviously.
But, I don't see a Women's Parlour here.
translation.fr: Mais il n'y a pas de Salon féminin.

translation.en: So, we're here in protest. Okay?
♪ Show me what a Women's Parlour looks like ♪
♪ This is what a Women's Parlour looks like! ♪
-♪ Show me what a Women's-- ♪ -[interrupting]
Uh-- Uh-- We're looking for John Stevens.
We heard he had a meeting. Know where we can find him?
translation.fr: Est-ce que tu sais où il est ?

translation.en: If I told you, I would lose my job.
translation.fr: Si je vous le dis, je suis viré.

translation.en: You know how weird this place is about secrets and traditions.
translation.fr: Ils sont très à cheval sur la discrétion.

translation.en: Hey, Miles.
Miles, we, uh... really...
need your help...
here. So...
All right, he's in the humidor. It's where a group of guys called The Bourbon Club meet.
translation.fr: Il est dans le fumoir avec le reste du Bourbon Club.

translation.en: Great. Where is it?
-It's around that corner, but-- -Okay. Thanks, Miles.
Okay, we'll see you later.
Did you see that? I, like, totally seduced him.
translation.fr: Il était totalement sous mon charme !

translation.en: [whispering] Focus! I think it's this.
There's nothing here.
thanks for nothing, Miles.
What are y'all in the mood for?
We got top shelf or... hell, we can all slum it with Beam.
translation.fr: On peut s'ouvrir un petit Beam, si vous êtes d'humeur.

translation.en: [man] Find that single barrel we like so much from Pigeon Forge. Mm.
translation.fr: Il doit rester un tonneau de Pigeon Forge.

translation.en: Anyway, now y'all gonna have to believe me when I tell y'all...
-that was Gerald. -[man] And now you're tellin' fibs.
[man 3] No, he's not. Girl was there, and the cops were coming
translation.fr: - C'est la vérité. - La fille était là, la police a débarqué.

translation.en: and John happened to be at the motel bar.
translation.fr: John était au bar du motel.

translation.en: [chuckles] Gerald asked him to take the fall.
Gerald's got rage issues.
Saying you're the one who beat up a whore is a damn big sacrifice.
translation.fr: Tu t'es sacrifié en disant que tu avais frappé cette fille ?

translation.en: He's been my business partner for 18 years.
Wife's in hospice care.
Ovarian cancer's got her any day now.
I couldn't let Gerald ruin himself in her eyes,
translation.fr: Gerald ne veut pas qu'elle sache.

translation.en: so when she passes, he'll confess.
translation.fr: Mais après sa mort, il avouera tout.

translation.en: And until then, I'm hidin' out.
[man 1] Dadgum, you're a good man, John.
translation.fr: Tu es un type bien, John.

translation.en: [man 2] A lot better than I'd have done, that's for damn sure.
translation.fr: Moi, je ne l'aurais pas fait.

translation.en: [man 1] Yeah, we know.
[man 2] Hey, I found it. There it is.
-[man 1] Finally. -[men chuckle]
[John] Bring that on in. Mmm.
It's looking good.
Sterling!
Holy shit.
Mr. Stevens was just protecting his fuckboy partner.
translation.fr: M. Stevens voulait juste couvrir son associé.

translation.en: We can't bring him in.
Dude, we need the money.
He didn't do it, it would be wrong. You know this!
translation.fr: Il n'a rien fait, c'est injuste !

translation.en: You can be very un-fun sometimes!
Get out of here! Oh, peach! [chuckles]
I'm a fruit ninja.
He wasn't there.
Goddamn it, I thought you said you knew what you were doin'.
translation.fr: Je croyais que vous étiez sûres de vous.

translation.en: We thought that you said that you knew what you were doing.
translation.fr: On croyait que tu étais sûr de tes infos.

translation.en: Yeah, Bowser, so you must of... had some misinformation.
translation.fr: Désolée, mais tu as dû être mal informé.

translation.en: Shhhit.
Misinformation.
Oh, that's awesome.
That's...
That's, that's it.
That was amazing.
Mmm. I love you.
I love you.
-Oh. Hey, babe. -Hey.
How was your day? It was really good. Did you have a good day?
translation.fr: - Bien, ta journée ? - Super, et toi ?

translation.en: I had such a good day.
-Okay, yeah... See ya. -Do you--?
-Okay. -See ya. Uh, I go-- I got golf.
You totally just boned.
[sighs] We made love.
You mean you boned, but slower?
translation.fr: C'est pareil, mais en moins vite ?

translation.en: That must have been so intense.
It was kind of awesome.
Oh, my God. When he's--
Hi, Sterling.
-Hi, April. -Hi, Blair.
If my-- If I didn't know my fate at this school
translation.fr: Si mon destin à l'école ne se trouvait pas

translation.en: rested in her cold little condom-wrapper-grabbing hands,
I'd feel bad for April about her dad.
translation.fr: j'aurais de la peine pour elle.

translation.en: I hate her dumb bitch face but... yeah.
translation.fr: C'est une pimbêche, mais quand même.

translation.en: If his business partner doesn't confess, does he have to go to jail for him?
translation.fr: Tu penses que son père va aller en prison ?

translation.en: She'd have one more thing to pray about, that's for sure.
translation.fr: Ça lui donnera une raison de prier.

translation.en: Shit. Shit. Shit.
translation.fr: ÇA VA BARDER. RENTREZ À LA MAISON. BISOUS, MAMAN

translation.en: Check your phone. Shit!
-[groans] -[cell phone bleeps]
You don't have to sign who it's from.
Disappointment is beyond what your father and I feel right now.
translation.fr: Votre père et moi sommes déçus, et le mot est faible.

translation.en: -We trusted you girls-- -The Volt is so small.
Oh, you do not interrupt me when I'm talking to you--!
translation.fr: Ne me coupe pas la parole !

translation.en: You do not interrupt your mother.
translation.fr: Ne lui coupe pas la parole.

translation.en: Took your father's truck without permission. You treated it like trash
translation.fr: Vous avez fichu en l'air la camionnette

translation.en: and what's more, you didn't even tell us about crashing it.
translation.fr: et vous ne nous avez rien dit !

translation.en: You were dishonest and you were irresponsible.
That's right.
We've decided that you two will have to pay for the repairs.
translation.fr: Par conséquent, c'est vous qui allez payer les réparations.

translation.en: That's right, you'll have to get jobs.
translation.fr: Vous allez devoir trouver un travail.

translation.en: [man] And if you can't handle that,
translation.fr: Et si vous n'y arrivez pas,

translation.en: then we will fix the truck with the money we spend sending you to Willingham.
translation.fr: nous utiliserons l'argent destiné à vos études à Willingham.

translation.en: Oh, that's good.
See if y'all can handle public school.
[woman] Is that what y'all want? Public school?
Where the principal wears blue jeans,
translation.fr: Un lycée avec un proviseur en jean

translation.en: and the classrooms are just one long bench and a chalkboard on wheels.
translation.fr: et des classes avec un long banc et un tableau à roulettes.

translation.en: -No, ma'am. -Maybe.
Young lady, don't you get smart with me.
translation.fr: Ne joue pas à la plus maline.

translation.en: Now, are we understood?
[both] Yes, ma'am.
[woman] Well, what are you waiting for? Go.
Go!
[sighs] If we leave right now, we can still make our court. Ooh.
translation.fr: On a tout juste le temps d'aller au tennis.

translation.en: -[rock music playing] -That's good good good good good good.
-That's good. -[knocking]
-Go away! -Hey.
Or come in.
We need work, Bowser.
And I need a big house with a white picket fence
translation.fr: Et moi je veux une grande maison

translation.en: and Tawny Kitaen in the back, cooking me up some pancakes.
translation.fr: et que Tawny Kitaen me fasse des pancakes.

translation.en: -That's what I need. -We're serious.
translation.fr: et que Tawny Kitaen me fasse des pancakes. Sérieusement.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Oh, I can tell.
Well, I gave you a chance
translation.fr: Je vous ai donné une chance

translation.en: and you didn't catch the skip,
so it doesn't sound promising to me.
You can use us.
We have a lot of power in the community.
translation.fr: On fait partie de la communauté.

translation.en: Like, the rich people community.
[chuckling] Yeah, okay, then.
Find me John Stevens.
You know, solicitation of a prostitute and battery,
translation.fr: Je vois mal John Stevens aller voir une prostituée et la violenter.

translation.en: that just doesn't sound like John Stevens. Are you sure that the charges are right?
translation.fr: Je vois mal John Stevens aller voir une prostituée et la violenter. Tu es sûr de toi ?

translation.en: I would hate to put him away if he didn't really do it.
translation.fr: On ne voudrait pas arrêter un innocent.

translation.en: Hold it right there.
A bounty hunter catches a guy and collects the bounty.
translation.fr: Moi, je ramène les fugitifs à la justice.

translation.en: -Whether he did it-- -Or she...
Whether he or she did it is no concern of mine.
translation.fr: Qu'il ou elle soit coupable, ça ne me regarde pas.

translation.en: And if you're real bounty hunters, it shouldn't be any of yours, either.
translation.fr: Vous devriez savoir ça, en tant que chasseuses de prime.

translation.en: -He knows we're not bounty hunters. -Maybe he doesn't, so just chill.
translation.fr: - Il nous a démasquées. - Peut-être pas. Relax.

translation.en: Okay. Yeah, I can do that.
Just soooo chill.
-Just super chill. -Chill.
So chill.
[sniffs] I know you're not really bounty hunters.
-Aw, shit. -Aw, shoot.
I mean, "Come again, dog?"
translation.fr: Je veux dire, répète ça, pour voir ?

translation.en: I ran your plates, kid.
You're the teenage daughters of Anderson and Deborah Wesley
translation.fr: Vous êtes les filles d'Anderson et Deborah Wesley

translation.en: of 495 Albemarle Circle.
Before that you were at 716 Margaret Mitchell.
translation.fr: Avant, vous étiez au 716, Margaret Mitchell.

translation.en: By the way, your mama has six unpaid parking tickets.
translation.fr: Et votre maman a six prunes à payer.

translation.en: You post on TikTok 4.2 times a week.
translation.fr: Vous postez sur TikTok 4,2 fois par semaine.

translation.en: -Should I go on? -TikTok is an art.
translation.fr: - Je continue ? - TikTok, c'est de l'art.

translation.en: How do you know all of that?
Because I'm good at my job,
translation.fr: Parce que je suis un pro.

translation.en: which is why I was going to let you get away with this until you deliver me John Stevens.
translation.fr: J'aurais fait comme si de rien n'était si vous m'aviez ramené Stevens.

translation.en: He's a big payday,
but obviously that's beyond your scope.
translation.fr: Mais c'est hors de votre portée.

translation.en: But you said yourself we're good at this stuff.
translation.fr: Tu disais qu'on était douées, pour ça !

translation.en: Did I really say that?
-Yes. -I don't-- Okay, but it just doesn't make sense for me, girls.
translation.fr: Sûrement pas. Bon, peut-être. Mais ça ne m'intéresse pas.

translation.en: It'd be like I was babysitting.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas un baby-sitter.

translation.en: [chuckles] And who wants to see me with a baby?
Do you understand? Hell, come on.
Feel free to come by here any time to say hi.
translation.fr: Passez me dire bonjour de temps en temps.

translation.en: Because y'all crack me up.
Don't arrest John Stevens. We have inside information. -He's innocent. -Yeah.
translation.fr: On sait de source sûre que Stevens est innocent.

translation.en: Inside information, hm?
All right, let's see.
Take a look at that.
Security footage from the night of the arrest.
translation.fr: Ça a été filmé le soir de l'arrestation.

translation.en: [Sterling] Oh, my gosh, it's totally him.
This is bonkerballs.
Mr. Stevens did it, that little lying piece of shit.
translation.fr: Stevens a vraiment fait ça, ce connard.

translation.en: -He beat up that poor woman. -We should have known.
He just happened to be at the bar? Motels don't have bars.
translation.fr: Il n'y a pas de bar, dans un motel.

translation.en: God, you're so smart. It's kind of annoying.
Okay, we need to find him.
Hey, text Miles and see if he's at The Men's Parlour.
translation.fr: Demande à Miles où il est.

translation.en: Good idea.
He said he can't tell me. -Tell him you'll go on a date with him. -[groans]
translation.fr: - Il ne veut pas me dire. - Propose-lui un rencard.

translation.en: He's not there.
Please!
There's no way he's hiding out at home.
translation.fr: Il ne peut pas être chez lui.

translation.en: How the hell are we gonna find out where he went?
I might have an idea.
You might have an idea or actually have an idea.
translation.fr: Tu as une idée, oui ou non ?

translation.en: No, I have an idea. Let me have my cool, ominous moment.
translation.fr: Oui, laisse-moi faire la fille cool.

translation.en: Okay, sorry.
It's just not cool.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas cool du tout.

translation.en: Hey, April, we need to talk to you.
The pressures of Fellowship too much already? I wish I could help.
translation.fr: Tu as déjà du mal avec la confrérie ? J'aimerais pouvoir t'aider.

translation.en: Oh, bless your heart.
Uh, no, we met with your daddy this week,
translation.fr: On a vu ton père en début de semaine,

translation.en: and he so graciously offered to sponsor our field trip to the soup kitchen.
translation.fr: et il a accepté de sponsoriser notre soupe populaire.

translation.en: What a sweet man.
Yeah, the problem is that funding is due tomorrow
translation.fr: On doit boucler le financement demain.

translation.en: and we can't seem to find him. Do you know where he is?
translation.fr: Tu sais où est ton père ?

translation.en: You met with him earlier this week?
Yeah, Monday. Lovely office.
Gorgeous interior design.
That's funny, because he took his helicopter to Hilton Head
translation.fr: Pourtant il est parti en hélico à Hilton Head

translation.en: for a golf retreat ten days ago.
translation.fr: pour faire du golf il y a 10 jours.

translation.en: -Ooh. -Okay... what?
I'll explain later.
Oh. Sorry, did I say this past Monday? I meant the Monday before that. I'm-- [chuckles]
translation.fr: Non, je voulais dire le lundi d'avant.

translation.en: -It's been a long day... -Yeah. ...and yeah, my brain's like melted into a puddle, and, yeah.
translation.fr: J'ai eu une dure journée. Mon cerveau est en bouillie.

translation.en: I don't know what you little tramps think you're up to,
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas ce que vous avez en tête,

translation.en: but I know you're lying.
You do not want to mess with me, honey.
Just need the money to continue to spread Christ's love.
translation.fr: On veut simplement répandre l'amour divin.

translation.en: -No need to get worked up about it. -Stay away from my family.
translation.fr: - Inutile de s'énerver. - Laisse ma famille tranquille.

translation.en: Have a blessed night.
Oh, you too, sweetie.
Read the room, Hannah B. For the love of God, read the room.
translation.fr: Tu es tellement naïve, Hannah B.

translation.en: Hey, Sterl?
I wonder what Ellen would say if she knew
translation.fr: Je me demande ce que dirait Ellen si elle apprenait

translation.en: that while I was home making care packages for homeless teens,
translation.fr: que pendant que je m'occupais de pauvres enfants sans-abri,

translation.en: her star Fellowship leader was spreading her legs for Luke Creswell
translation.fr: la nouvelle présidente de la confrérie écartait les cuisses pour Luke Creswell sur le parking.

translation.en: in the senior lot.
translation.fr: écartait les cuisses pour Luke Creswell sur le parking.

translation.en: Gosh.
What would the whole school... say?
Hoarder.
It was fun while it lasted, Sterl, huh?
Our little life of badassery?
Just would have been nice if it ended after we got the money to pay back Mom and Dad.
translation.fr: Et on a même pas de quoi rembourser les parents.

translation.en: Maybe we can get jobs at that other Yogurtopia on Peachtree.
translation.fr: On pourrait postuler au Yogurtopia de Peachtree.

translation.en: Might not suck so hard if we get the same shift.
"Hashtag April helps sick kids through Christ."
translation.fr: Hashtag "April aide les enfants malades grâce à Dieu."

translation.en: What?
That's the hashtag of April's discipleship weekend. Where she took that stupid helicopter to her lake house.

translation.en: Oh, shit. Yeah.
I bet he is hiding out there.
But how do we find the address?
Well, if April geo-tagged the photos, then--
translation.fr: Si April a géolocalisé la publication…

translation.en: [groans] Except she blocked me.
And her dad's account is private.
translation.fr: Et le compte de son père est privé.

translation.en: Unless...
Take one of me like this.
Sterling take-- Sterling.
Ster-- Sterling! What are you doing?
Fake account, sexy profile pics,
translation.fr: Je crée un faux profil avec des photos sexy.

And now we wait.

-Owen Caruthers. -Yeah. Chase Holten.
-What? No! -Eww.
Owen's, like, spooky hot.
translation.fr: Owen, c'est le genre beau ténébreux sexy.

translation.en: Chase is, like, boring and hot.
I like his hair-swoopy thing
and he looks like he'd be a really good cuddler.
Owen looks like he's going to die of some old-timey disease.

translation.en: Yeah, I love that.
-[cell phone chimes] -Hey.
Oh, dang, that was fast.
translation.fr: @JOHNSTEVENSUGA73 A ACCEPTÉ LA DEMANDE C'était rapide.

translation.en: [chuckles] Clearly a boob man.
Okay, we have the address. Let's go!
Wait wait wait wait....
What about Fellowship?
What about April ruining your Christian reputation?
He beat up a prostitute.
Letting John Stevens walk around free of judgment?
translation.fr: Je refuse de le laisser s'en tirer comme ça.

translation.en: That just wouldn't be the Christian thing to do.
translation.fr: Ce ne serait pas très chrétien.

translation.en: Christ for the win!
Badassery reinstated.
It's coming up.
He's not in the den.
Go.
Dude...
Look. Look.
[Sterling] That must be him.
We're straight-up detectives.
It's so baller. I feel baller.
Adventure kind of makes me horny.
Everything makes you horny.
Come on.
-[Blair and Sterling grunt] -Dear Lord!
Sterling?
I want to say, Jessica?
[chuckling] What are you ladies doing here?
You know, you're lucky I didn't use my gun.
That's okay. We'll use ours.
translation.fr: Pas la peine, on a la nôtre.

translation.en: Prostitute beater!
The hell are you doing?
-I'll have you arrested. What the hell? -[gun cocks]
Actually, Mr. Stevens, it's kind of the opposite.
translation.fr: À vrai dire, ce ne sera pas la peine.

translation.en: We're having you arrested.
-We'll have you arrested. -What?
Remember when you thought it would be cool to cheat on your wife with a prostitute and then beat her up?
translation.fr: Vous trouviez ça cool de tabasser une prostituée ?

translation.en: Turns out, not so cool.
translation.fr: En fait, ça n'est pas si cool.

translation.en: -Yeah, not so cool. -You little cunts.
-[girls gasp] -"Little C-words?"
Mr. Stevens, you crossed a line. That's nasty.
Guess what else is nasty?
I've peed in your pool.
A bunch.
How dare you? Get out of my way!
Oh, nice move, goalie.
[Blair] Yeah. Gave him the old "Wesley check".
By the way, my name is Blair, bitch.
-Can you "drink" me? -Yep.
God, I'm still absolutely starving.
translation.fr: Mon Dieu, je meurs de faim.

translation.en: -I've literally never been hungrier. -[groans]
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais eu aussi faim.

translation.en: Oh, y'all gonna be sorry.
Hey, Mr. Stevens?
Could you shut the fuck up?
...and we asked about the help wanted poster.
And he, like, hired us on the spot.
Another great thing is the hours are flexible
translation.fr: En plus, les horaires sont flexibles

translation.en: and they're open late.
So, instead of going to parties, you can go to work.
translation.fr: Vous ne pourrez plus faire la fête, alors.

translation.en: That sounds fair.
So tell me, what's the pay?
-Oh. -Oh. I think it's like, um... like a hundred...
translation.fr: Je crois que c'est environ cent…

translation.en: Fifty?
A hundred fifty dollars an hour?
-[Sterling] Oh, no-- -[Blair] Dollars? No.
-Like, dimes an hour. -Yeah.
Obviously.
-That's fifteen bucks an hour. -Yeah.
[Blair] Right? Because when in, um--
Hi, Mr. Bowser! Meet our parents.
-Hi! -[Bowser] All right.
Yeah, all right.
Gotta get this... [mumbling]
Oh, hey, you know, hey. The kids...
Uh, they're good.
Uh, good job. Yeah.
-They're all right. -[Bowser] Yes, all right.
[chuckling] All right. Well, we will see y'all at home.
translation.fr: Bon, on se retrouve à la maison.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Be safe.
Blair, honey, don't you think maybe you should tie your hair back?
translation.fr: Blair, tu devrais peut-être t'attacher les cheveux.

translation.en: You know, being around all this food.
Yeah. Yes, Mama.
Okay. Oh, nice to meet you.
Uh... toodle-oo, then.
Take care, Miss Cathy.
-Love you! -Bye!
-[Debbie] Love y'all. -Drive safe.
Sterling, who am I?
Well, hey, who am I?
No, her hand's... Her hand's here.
Ah, Jesus.
What's happening? Did y'all pay for that?
You can just take it out of our fifty percent.
Okay, girls, you need to understand that there's a seniority in this business,
translation.fr: Vous savez, l'ancienneté, c'est important dans ce métier.

translation.en: and I've been doing it much longer than you have,
so that has earned me a certain level of status, see?
translation.fr: Ça me donne un statut plus élevé, vous comprenez ?

translation.en: So I'll give you 2K
and the name of my guy who'll fix your truck up for you cheap.
translation.fr: et le nom d'un copain pour réparer votre camionnette.

translation.en: Well, what if we don't accept that?
Oh, this is you playing hardball? -Sure. -[chuckles] Okay.
Seeing as how you're underage and can't secure a license to bounty hunt,
translation.fr: Vous êtes mineures et vous n'avez pas de permis de chasseurs de prime.

translation.en: if you want to keep working with me,
I don't think you have any options but to accept my terms.
translation.fr: j'ai bien peur que vous n'ayez pas vraiment le choix.

translation.en: So, you want to keep working with us?
I suppose I could, uh, see your potential
translation.fr: Disons que vous pouvez m'être utiles

translation.en: to broaden my access around these parts.
Oh, Jesus. [woman] Yelp says you don't close until eleven.
translation.fr: - Bon sang. - Selon Internet, ça ouvre jusqu'à 23 h.

translation.en: -So does your voicemail. -Goddamn it.
translation.fr: - Et selon votre répondeur aussi. - Merde !

translation.en: Visors on, let's go.
Come on.
And put that hair in a bun or somethin'. Fix it up.
translation.fr: Et fais un chignon ou quelque chose.

translation.en: [Blair] You sound like my mom.
